mapper.select: ( SELECT a.id AS id, a.full_name AS name, ta.storage_path AS imgpath, "铁扇拍" as type FROM car_pm_auction a INNER JOIN car_pm_auction_file f ON a.id = f.auction_id INNER JOIN tb_attachment ta ON f.attachment_id = ta.id WHERE a.full_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') and a.auction_state in ('2','4','5','8') ORDER BY a.update_time DESC ) UNION ALL ( SELECT csod.id AS id, csod.car_model_number AS name, ta.storage_path AS imgpath, "车报废" as type FROM car_scrap_order_deal csod LEFT JOIN tb_attachment ta ON csod.head_img_id = ta.id where csod.car_model_number like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') ORDER BY csod.createtime DESC )
